### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) and transport belts at positions ((-16.5, -51.5), (-15.5, -51.5))
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and transport belts at positions ((-16.5, -51.5), (-15.5, -51.5), (-14.5, -51.5), (-13.5, -51.5))
### Iron Plate Factory at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position (-10.0, -49.0)) 
### Transport Belt System at position(-17.5, -51.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group with inputs at position ((-17.5, -51.5) -> (-15.5, -51.5)) and outputs at position ((-14.5, -51.5) -> (-12.5, -51.5))
### Transport Belt System at position(-12.5, -46.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Belt group with inputs at position ((-12.5, -46.5) -> (-12.5, -48.5)) and outputs at position ((-12.5, -47.5) -> (-12.5, -49.5))
### Chest and Inserter System at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of following entities
-  Chest (position (-16.5, -47.5)) and burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
 -  Ensure that the burner mining drills have sufficient fuel to operate.
 -  Ensure that the output of the burner mining drills is not blocked by items on the ground and that there is a sink entity in place to accept the output.
### Errors when using furnaces
 -  Ensure that the furnaces have sufficient fuel to operate.
### Errors when using inserter
 -  Ensure that the inserter has source items to pick up.
### Errors when using burner inserter
 -  Ensure that the burner inserter has sufficient fuel to operate.
 -  Ensure that the burner inserter has source items to pick up.

### NAMESPACE
*   No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
*   Important variables:
    *   `wooden-chest`: 2 (int)
    *   `transport-belt`: 7 (int)
    *   `burner-mining-drill`: 1 (int)
    *   `stone-furnace`: 1 (int)
    *   `iron-ore`: 1074 (int)
    *   `iron-plate`: 168 (int)
